TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It protects your computer by rejecting the execution.

I wish the planet was revolving around the Kerbal.

(On the previous poster's pfp)

Granted. That Kerbal turns into a black hole. 

I wish a bow. 

Edited March 29, 2022 by Abel101126

Si Señor. El bow is a part of every your arm.

I wish to clone the qml file into another project.

You don't have enough storage.

I wish I can have a knife.

Granted: You try to Bishop with it and cut off all your fingers.

I wish for serenity.

Granted. You got a serenity folder from one DLC. 

I wish I can manipulate gravity.

Granted. First the floor kicks your btt, then you hit the ceiling with head.

I wish the file renaming process gets finished soon and correctly.

Edited March 29, 2022 by kerbiloid

Granted: But the computer decides it knows best and names them according to it's system.

I wish for more knowledge.

Granted. You take a ledge and study it to know.

I wish for 1-sided spherical dice.

you break the universe

 

i wish all mods work on any version and instant loading

Edited March 30, 2022 by tremonthedgehog

Granted. But your KSP was TOO slow that you need 100, 000 yrs to take off. 

I wish infinite fuel.

Granted. Now you need engine for it.

I wish it would be easier to find backup parts for Lamborghini at our place.

Granted: You sell your Lamborghini to buy parts.

I wish for the Cannon Ball Run.

Granted. You try to escape a nuclear cannonball. Dread it, runs from it, the cannonball arrives at the same. 

I wish I am the owner of the infinity glove.

Granted, but its quickly stolen by a bunch of people  in costumes with jetpacks and super-strength.

I wish for nothing.

Granted. Now you live  in the worlds of ideas, with no material thing around.

I wish Rumpelschtilzchen was using a stronger password.

Granted: You randomly add some numbers too it.

I wish a Deathstar trench run.

Not granted. WWI has proven that everyone who was trying to correctly pronounce the "-thst-" had no more time to run into the trench.

I wish pound was equal to twenty shillings and two hundred and fourty pence, like we studied in school.

Granted. You get a pound of antimatter. 

I wish the destroy of the human civilization.

Granted: You are removed first and then they change their mind.

I wish for Thunderbird 2

Granted. It is waa a stupid combination of SRBs and parachutes. 

I wish the big bang.

Granted:It happened so fast you never got time to register it.

I wish for _______________________

Granted. ________________. 

I wish a elbow.

You get three fifths of an elbow.

I wish that everyone who saw this watched the video in the spoiler.

Spoiler

Granted But the spoiler fails to load

i wish for a tank
